definition[0]: when an activity, situation, or process begins again after a period when it had stopped
example[0]: Spring is a time of renewal.
example[1]: a renewal of the recent conflict
definition[1]: when you make an agreement or official document continue for a further period of time after it ends
example[2]: Mark’s contract comes up for renewal at the end of this year.
example[3]: the renewal of our annual licence
definition[2]: when people arrange for a contract, agreement, deal etc to continue
example[4]: The contractcomes up for renewal next year.
example[5]: The government can deny license renewals if a station doesn’t carry adequate programming for children.
definition[3]: when a company, economy, area etc is changed and improved
example[7]: proposals for economic renewal and growth
